text: My wife disagrees with 100 percent of what I say. That's the same marriage I have.
author: Curtis Sliwa

text: I'm not feeling very well - I need a doctor immediately. Ring the nearest golf course.
author: Groucho Marx

text: A hospital bed is a parked taxi with the meter running.
author: Groucho Marx

text: Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died.
author: Erma Bombeck

text: They certainly give very strange names to diseases.
author: Plato
